dc:title: Fall Appeal - October 1963
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reminds readers we are all responsible for each other--" Hold on to each other. We are each one responsible, one for another. We are all brothers."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 807 1963-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
